Unlock at least one perk and one gear option for the Thief.

As a Fighter, use the skill "Berserk" next to an enemy.
As a Fighter, kill a ranged enemy with Charge.
As a Fighter, buy the "Enrage" and "Frenzy" talents in the same run.
As a Fighter, get your Attack stat to 20 or higher.
As a Fighter, start with the perk "Constant Bubbling Rage" and then fill your skill bar.
As a Fighter, clear an Act without spending talent points on Hard difficulty or higher.
As a Wizard, kill an enemy in one hit with Fireball.
As a Wizard, have "Inspiration" trigger three times in a row.
As a Wizard, clear an Act with a live enslaved enemy.
As a Wizard, Leech enemies 10 times.
As a Wizard, completely fill your skill bar with Magic spells.
As a Wizard, completely clear the Mage Academy (3-4) of enemies on Suicide difficulty.
As a Wizard, have five or more allies at one time.
As a Thief, kill an enemy with a Sneak Attack.
As a Thief, complete 1-1 without alerting a single enemy.
As a Thief, use Shadow Walk to disappear while nearby enemies are blinded.
As a Thief, buy something with "Discount" while holding more than 500 gold.
As a Thief, get your Speed stat to 20 or higher.
As a Thief, pick up all items in Asterion's Lair (1-7) before killing the boss.
As a Ranger, kill an enemy with "Bow" at the very edge of your vision.
As a Ranger, get your Stealth stat to 5 or higher.
As a Ranger, share 20 health or more with Dog via "Blood Link".
As a Ranger, kill an enemy with the damage-over-time effect of "Poison Arrow".
As a Ranger, clear an Act without Dog falling unconscious.
As a Ranger, kill all enemies in the Village and Forest (1-1 to 1-3) on Suicide difficulty.
As a Pugilist, kill a stunned enemy with an Uppercut.
As a Pugilist, kill a ranged enemy by knocking another into them with Knockback.
As a Pugilist, dodge three attacks in a row using the "Reflexes" talent or "Boxer's Boots".
As a Pugilist, max out the Unarmed talent.
As a Pugilist, clear an Act using the "I Travel Light" perk on Suicide difficulty.

displayName.english: This Is Your Brain On Magic

description.english: As a Paladin, stun a spellcaster with "Dispel".

As a Paladin, clear an Act using the "Noncombatant" perk.
Unlock the Alchemist class.
As an Alchemist, one-shot thirty enemies with Pistol.
As an Alchemist, clear the City (3-2 and 3-3) of enemies on Hard difficulty or higher.
As an Alchemist, Combine two items to produce a Spellbook.
As an Alchemist, use a Legendary item while carrying Legendary equipment and a Legendary weapon.
Try out three different classes.

Complete the game on Suicide difficulty and reach Challenge Rank 35.
